title: High Schools Deliver Monthly Social Education via Mobile Devices
text:
09 High Schools Deliver Monthly Social Education via Mobile Devices 
THE Journal: Two high schools in New Jersey are the first to test out an online service to help students navigate problems such as bullying, sexual assault and health and wellness. North Hunterdon High School and Voorhees High School have both adopted Evolution Labs' H360 application and expect to add P360 (the "parent" edition) in the future. The schools have branded their version of the programs as North360 and Vorhees360.
